channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 拜登政府承诺向 GlobalFoundries 提供 15 亿美元的赠款，这是振兴国内半导体产业的第一笔大额赠款。
item.description: The Biden administration is pledging $1.5 billion in grants to GlobalFoundries in the first major award to revitalize the domestic semiconductor industry.

item.title: 劳伦-博伯特（Lauren Boebert）将在科罗拉多州的一个新选区竞选国会议员，分析人士预计该选区的共和党初选将十分激烈，难以预料。
item.description: Lauren Boebert is running for Congress in a new Colorado district—where analysts expect a hard-fought and unpredictable GOP primary race on.wsj.com/3T3TMRp on.wsj.com/3T3TMRp

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼曾教导一代青年活动家从地方开始推动变革。这场运动已逐渐熄灭。
item.description: Alexei Navalny taught a generation of young activists to push for change, starting at the local level. That movement has steadily been extinguished. on.wsj.com/3OOSYO1 on.wsj.com/3OOSYO1

item.title: 农历新年期间上路的中国游客比以往任何时候都多，但许多人的预算有限
item.description: More Chinese travelers hit the road during the Lunar New Year holiday than ever before, but many restricted themselves to shoestring budgets on.wsj.com/3ULMymq

item.title: 如果你认为每次锻炼都是一场大汗淋漓的狂欢，让你喘不过气来，那就大错特错了
item.description: If you think every workout has to be a sweat-fest that leaves you gasping for air, think again on.wsj.com/3UFpdCV on.wsj.com/3UFpdCV

item.title: 马瑙斯是亚马逊地区的一个大都市，这里的一位企业家正在探索如何带领游客深入丛林，亲眼目睹保护雨林的艰巨性。
item.description: An entrepreneur in Manaus, a sprawling metropolis in the Amazon, is on a quest to take travelers deeper into the jungle to see for themselves what’s at stake in protecting the rainforest on.wsj.com/48j3S5a on.wsj.com/48j3S5a

item.title: 一位护士用一辆高尔夫球车和一辆类似于 "奥斯汀-鲍尔斯"（Austin Powers）中的卡车的零件，制造了他那辆罕见的 1969 年斯巴鲁 360 电动车。
item.description: A nurse made his rare 1969 Subaru 360 electric with parts from a golf cart and a truck like the one in “Austin Powers” on.wsj.com/49GLjJE on.wsj.com/49GLjJE

item.title: 男人穿什么最性感（和最不性感）？我们对 2000 名男性和女性进行了调查。剧透远离红色。
item.description: What are the sexiest (and least sexy) things men can wear? We surveyed 2,000 men and women. Spoiler: Stay away from red. on.wsj.com/3wf4qMh on.wsj.com/3wf4qMh

item.title: 这本男士指南解决了通勤者常年面临的难题：穿什么衣服既能让你在去办公室的路上感到舒适，又能让你在办公桌前显得精神（不流汗）？
item.description: This men's guide solves a perennial commuter's dilemma: What to wear so you're comfy en route to the office and look sharp (and unsweaty) at your desk? on.wsj.com/3UKWY5L on.wsj.com/3UKWY5L

item.title: 与朋友一起旅行听起来似乎很有趣，但它可能会导致各种意想不到的冲突，包括财务冲突。以下是经验丰富的专家介绍的正确做法。
item.description: Traveling with friends might sound fun on paper but it can lead to all kinds of unexpected conflicts, including financial ones. Here's how to do it right, according to seasoned experts. on.wsj.com/3T2Lx8f on.wsj.com/3T2Lx8f

item.title: 从餐厅预订到最佳通勤路线，聊天机器人门房很快就会为我们打点好生活中的各种安排，但他们需要小费
item.description: Chatbot concierges will soon take care of lots of life's arrangements for us, from restaurant reservations to the best routes for commuting—but they'll expect tips on.wsj.com/4bGcRjM on.wsj.com/4bGcRjM

item.title: Waxahatchee 的新专辑以欢快的南方摇滚和原始的歌声为特色。在这里，她谈到了在旅游大巴后座上写歌的经历，以及让她渡过难关的项链。
item.description: Waxahatchee’s new album features rollicking Southern rock and raw vocals. Here, she talks about writing songs from the back of her tour bus and the necklace that got her through the process. on.wsj.com/42X3kkN on.wsj.com/42X3kkN

item.title: 艾米-舒默（Amy Schumer）的喜剧生涯是从一个并不有趣的地方开始的。"我早期的焦虑和幽默很大程度上来自于缺乏稳定。我的父母很爱我，但事情总是在不断地改变"。
item.description: Amy Schumer's start to comedy came from a not-so-funny place. "Much of my early anxiety and humor came from a lack of stability. My parents loved me, but things kept chipping away." on.wsj.com/3T2WYwA on.wsj.com/3T2WYwA

item.title: 您的猫咪被困在树上了吗？爬树专家会用绳索、安全带和猫咪悄悄话来解决猫咪的不幸。"拉尔菲，为什么不让我来帮你呢，伙计？"
item.description: Is your cat stuck in a tree? Expert tree climbers will come out to fix feline misadventures—with ropes, harnesses and cat whispering. “Ralphie, why don’t you let me help you, buddy?” on.wsj.com/3SZLp9y on.wsj.com/3SZLp9y

item.title: 科学家们现在可以利用 3-D 打印技术制造出能像真脑细胞一样工作的新脑细胞。专栏作家乔-奎纳（Joe Queenan）认为，需要这些细胞的人大有人在。
item.description: Scientists can now use 3-D printing to make new brain cells that work like real ones. Columnist Joe Queenan sees a long line of people who need them. on.wsj.com/3I3fb6X on.wsj.com/3I3fb6X

item.title: Zyn 是公众健康的福音还是对儿童的威胁？
item.description: Is Zyn a boon for public health or a threat to children? on.wsj.com/3SGXC1z on.wsj.com/3SGXC1z

item.title: 十年前，在比弗利伍德花二三十万美元就能买到一栋房子。现在呢？"你不可能以低于300万美元的价格买到任何一条黄金街道上的地皮"。
item.description: A decade ago, you could buy a house in Beverlywood for $200,000 to $300,000. Now? “You can’t buy just land on any of the prime streets for less than $3 million.” on.wsj.com/4bDZikV on.wsj.com/4bDZikV

item.title: 16 支黄油、20 杯面粉、36 枚鸡蛋：这些都是煎饼公主一天的工作。来看看她的制作过程吧。
item.description: 16 sticks of butter, 20 cups of flour, 36 eggs: It's all in a day's blogging for the Pancake Princess. Take a peek inside her process. on.wsj.com/3wjga0q on.wsj.com/3wjga0q

item.title: 北约就像一张美元钞票：它的价值取决于人们对它的信任。现在，这种信念正受到唐纳德-特朗普的攻击。
item.description: NATO is like a dollar bill: Its value rests on the faith people put in it. Now that faith is under attack from Donald Trump. on.wsj.com/49HZKgv on.wsj.com/49HZKgv

item.title: 美国和中国正在台湾以东加强航母演习，这一重要地区在任何东亚冲突中都会受到重视
item.description: The U.S. and China are stepping up aircraft-carrier exercises east of Taiwan, a vital region that would be prized in any East Asia conflict on.wsj.com/3uujcOR on.wsj.com/3uujcOR

item.title: 香港的超豪华住宅已贬值超过四分之一。房价尚未触底。
item.description: Hong Kong’s superluxury homes have lost more than a quarter of their value. Prices haven’t hit the bottom yet. on.wsj.com/48nLAQk on.wsj.com/48nLAQk

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼曾教导一代青年活动家从地方开始推动变革。这场运动已逐渐熄灭。
item.description: Alexei Navalny taught a generation of young activists to push for change, starting at the local level. That movement has steadily been extinguished. on.wsj.com/3ULwnp7 on.wsj.com/3ULwnp7

item.title: 高调解雇。令人震惊的丑闻数十年来最大规模的车队重组 一级方程式正处于近代史上最动荡的休赛期。
item.description: A high-profile firing. A shock scandal. And the biggest team switch in decades. Formula 1 is in the midst of its most tumultuous offseason in recent history. on.wsj.com/3I7qOdf on.wsj.com/3I7qOdf

item.title: "我们厌倦了'该死，你老了'的卡片"。尽管一些美国老年人喜欢这种嘲讽，但在这场从生日贺卡中剔除 "年龄歧视 "的运动中。"你需要幽默感"
item.description: “We’re tired of the ‘Damn, you’re old’ cards.” Inside the movement to strike “ageism” from birthday cards, though some older Americans like the ribbing. “You need a sense of humor.” on.wsj.com/3SJI5xV on.wsj.com/3SJI5xV

item.title: 童话般的城堡已经过去。长期关闭的历史悠久的监狱现在成了热门的婚礼场地。"我拖着婚纱走过艾尔-卡彭的牢房 我们欢笑起舞，尽情狂欢！"
item.description: Move over fairytale castles. Long-closed historic prisons are now hot wedding venues. “I dragged my dress past Al Capone’s cell and we laughed and danced and had a ball!” on.wsj.com/3I570qE on.wsj.com/3I570qE

item.title: 神圣的磨牙仙子：牙仙子最近大出风头，一些孩子为兄弟姐妹赢得了百元大钞、名牌手链和巧克力。但是，随着父母们提高赌注，事情就变得尴尬了。
item.description: Holy Molar: the Tooth fairy is going big these days, Some kids are scoring $100 bills, designer bracelets and chocolates for siblings. But as parents up the ante, things get awkward. on.wsj.com/48mo0mY on.wsj.com/48mo0mY

item.title: 一幅小画可以改变你的生活，"神经美学 "科学家有证据表明，它还可以改善你的健康。
item.description: A teeny painting can change your life and "neuroaesthetic" scientists have evidence that it can also improve your health. on.wsj.com/3I7jiz3 on.wsj.com/3I7jiz3

item.title: 无论是在停机坪上还是在会议室里，超级富豪们都对这些便鞋赞不绝口
item.description: Super-wealthy men swear by these slip-ons, whether they’re on the tarmac or in the boardroom on.wsj.com/49jjMhw on.wsj.com/49jjMhw

item.title: 我们毁了性爱吗？五位作家提出了一个问题：在人类最亲密的行为方面，社会是否已经迷失了方向？
item.description: Have we ruined sex? Five writers ask whether society has lost its way when it comes to the most intimate of human acts. on.wsj.com/3wiBfYB on.wsj.com/3wiBfYB

item.title: 纽约时装周的惊喜之星？40 岁以上的女性
item.description: The surprise stars of New York Fashion Week? Women over 40 on.wsj.com/3OOyiWp on.wsj.com/3OOyiWp
